context: Do we need to buy a "joystick" type device to play or just use the mouse?
Compatible with Will U Remote Plus or the old Wii Remote Controller?
response: Yeah it is compatible with both the remote plus  and the regular/old one.

context: Will this work for MS Flight Sim Gold for Windows 8.1?
response: The Wheel Stand Pro is piece of hardware, a rack if you will, to which you attach your yoke, gauges, rudder pedals, etc.  The Wheel Stand Pro has no computer connection of its own. I would think it would work with hardware which works with Windows 8.1.

context: Hi! Before I buy this I would like to know if when you buy this you get it forever or for 1 year because it says you get 12 battlepacks for 12 Months.
response: You keep them forever. You will also get the packs that you've missed so far.

context: How many people can play on the console at once?
response: It is single player but if you posses xbox live you can play with friends

context: Does this game have multiplayer mode?
response: You can play offline against and co-op with your friends. Also you can challenge people with on line matches, although personally I never have.

context: Can you have the butterfly key section on the right side of the board.  I'm a lefty and can't find a left handed gaming keyboard.
response: No. it is built into the keyset. There may be an opposite layout for a keyset out there, but as of yet I have not seen one.

context: Does flightstick  Pro USB 4 have it's own throttle control on the stick
response: One of the "wheel" controls gets assigned to throttle, so yes. I have flown this stick with both MS Flight and X-Plane and highly recommend. The quality is excellent.

context: where the instructions on how to work the controls, read lies, read green slopes etc.??
response: On the disc, I don't remember if there was a printed version,,,likely not.

context: Do the newer figures (Baymax, Hero, etc.) work on the 1.0? My kids do not know who the Marvel characters are, but want the new figures.
response: They do not work on the original Wii.  My understanding it that it works on all the others Xbox 360. Play Station and W U.
No it does not come with the charger but the ps3 comes with the charger. It is a USB cable.
